name: KenneyJam 2021 - Rotations
description:
Right-click rotates, middle-click pans, left-click selects a new "star" to focus on. Pressing 1-6 will select the home star of each "player". (You're player 1)

The  original intent was to let ships build up in your star system(s) and then shoot them to new stars Angry Birds-style. If other "fleets" end up in the same system, they would randomly fight Risk-style.

This is now what should have been Day 2's version, if I hadn't broken it after midnight. The "left-click select" now only selects systems you control, and since I didn't get the "send ships" finished, you only control one. As a compromise, I added a temporary input to select the different players to jump around more.
